attributes.action: Re-open Hatfield Airflield for Civil Flying
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This Airfield in Hertfordshire is currently not used for civil flights. I would like to see it re-opened for Civil Flying.

THis would be a boost not only to the local area and econony, but also to tourism. It would also prove to be very popular with Aviation Enthusiasts all over the country.
